issue.title: [FlightRPC] [Java] Integration test client doesn't close buffers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5978](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5978). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The integration test client doesn't close any of the clients or free any of the buffers it creates.

Trying to do so leads to a leak problem on the dictionary vector case.
